name: craigslist-scraper
description: Scrape Craigslist roommate listings with AI-powered search

scripts.scrape: npx tsc scraper.ts --target es2020 --module commonjs --moduleResolution node --esModuleInterop --skipLibCheck && node scraper.js
scripts.chat: npx tsc housing-agent.ts --target es2020 --module commonjs --moduleResolution node --esModuleInterop --skipLibCheck && node housing-agent.js
scripts.multi-agent: npx tsc multi-agent-system.ts --target es2020 --module commonjs --moduleResolution node --esModuleInterop --skipLibCheck && node multi-agent-system.js
scripts.tomtom-commute: npx tsc agents/commute-agent-tomtom.ts --target es2020 --module commonjs --moduleResolution node --esModuleInterop --skipLibCheck && node agents/commute-agent-tomtom.js
